com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.interfaces
Interface IComponent

All Known Implementing Classes:
Client, ClientHandler, Component, Game
public interface IComponent

IComponent defines an interface for a Component which can be connected to other IComponent to form a bigger system.

IComponent is initialized during activation after constructing the instance. This allows for a system to form its essential connections before actual initialization process.

IComponent can be activated or deactivated. An IComponent is functional only when it is activated.

Version:
Creation date: 05-23-2008 15:40 EST, Modified date: 06-06-2008 17:23 EST
Author:
Yi Wang (Neakor)
